lines.text: I want you to be my date, Rose.
Anything else for you today?
Uh yeah just some deodorant.
No sweat... Get it?
Come on, kid, don't play hard to get. What about New Year's Eve?
Well, that was different. I couldn't help myself.
Hey, who turned off the band?

[Mark and Pam are at the darkened and empty police station discussing their next move]
I want to check out the dorm again.

[referring to the Prowler]
You really think he might still be there.
Right now, that's all we have to do on.

[they attempt to leave but are stopped when a drunk Kingsley walks in]
Well... looke here.
[referring to the sheriff]
George left you in charge here! Can't you keep those damn kids under control?
What're you doing here, Kingsley?
It's... that damn graduation thing. We haven't had any trouble in that cottage for more than 30 years... now somebody has to start that damn thing over again.
What do you mean?
There's a bunch of kids over there in the cemetary... I know what they're doing in there.
Yeah, well what are they doing in there?
Well... it was dark.
[stuttering]
I co-couldn't see anything.
Well, if you couldn't see anything, why don't you just go home.

[slurring]
Suurrre. But that gate was wiiiiiide open.

[talking on the phone]
Damn right it's my fishing trip. And if you bother me about anything, Bill, I'll kick your ass across the state line, okay?
Aren't you going to invite me in?
How about you take off your clothes?
Start your stopwatch, coach.
